title: End-to-end smoke test of context feature
description:
Final validation that the complete context feature works end-to-end.

## Test Scenario
1. Create new epic with 3 tasks
2. Run `ticker run <epic-id>`
3. Verify context generated before first task
4. Verify context appears in task prompts
5. Verify TUI shows context status
6. Run `ticker context <epic-id> --show`
7. Run `ticker context <epic-id> --refresh`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Context file created at .ticker/context/<epic-id>.md
- [ ] First task prompt includes context section
- [ ] Subsequent tasks include same context
- [ ] TUI header shows context indicator
- [ ] CLI commands work as documented
- [ ] No errors in logs

## Human Workflow
1. Build ticker: `go build -o ticker ./cmd/ticker`
2. Create test epic: `./scripts/create-test-epic.sh`
3. Run ticker and observe behavior
4. Verify all acceptance criteria manually
5. Clean up test data
